#Text=Learn Handyman Skills

#Text=On-the-job experience is one of the best ways to learn handyman skills , but if you want to start a handyman business , you 'll usually need a business license and other formal certifications declaring your competency as a handyman .
#Text=If you want to pursue a handyman career , start your training at home by performing simple maintenance on routine systems such as plumbing and heating .
#Text=Later you can pursue formal vocational training , then go on to earn a handyman certification provided by your city or county .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Look for basic repairs needed around your house .
#Text=Whether you rent or own a home , every structure requires maintenance .
#Text=Stay ahead of seasonal repairs and maintenance by fixing problems before inclement weather occurs .
#Text=Look for leaks in your roof in summer , before heavy rains occur .
#Text=Check the furnace before the weather turns cold .
#Text=Inspect your home for pest infestations during early spring , before the warm weather causes bugs to reproduce .
#Text=Acquaint yourself with home systems such as plumbing , one of the most common home systems that requires ongoing care .
#Text=Learn how to use a plumber 's tools to perform basic maintenance on your home 's plumbing systems .
#Text=Keep drains running smoothly .
#Text=Remove hair and other debris on a regular basis by employing the help of a drain snake .
#Text=Fix leaks .
#Text=Look underneath sinks , behind toilets and around spigots to find free-flowing water .
#Text=Discovering how to find a leak 's source is critical for any handyman to perform simple plumbing repairs without having to hire a licensed plumber .
#Text=Tell friends and family that you want to help with home repairs .
#Text=Although most homes have similar systems , the more experience you have on different types of homes , the more skilled you 'll become at being a general handyman .
#Text=Get handyman training at a vocational school .
#Text=Many adult education schools offer courses in basic handyman training .
#Text=Check community college catalogs for course offerings .
#Text=Apprentice with an experienced handyman .
#Text=Volunteer your services to act as an apprentice for a home repair expert .
#Text=Although you wo n't get paid , you 'll receive free on-the-job training and guidance by a more experienced professional .
#Text=Study local building codes and contractor 's requirements .
#Text=Each city has different criteria for handyman contractors who work on homes .
#Text=Many will prohibit anyone but a licensed general contractor to make home repairs in excess of a certain dollar amount .
#Text=If you intend to earn money as a home handyman , know the scope of the type of projects you can work on before a contractor 's license is required by your city .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Projects such as Habitat for Humanity are always in need of volunteer construction labor . Learn handyman skills by volunteering to building a home for a needy family .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Ensure that your friends and family know you are a handyman student .
#Text=Do n't attempt to fix problems that are beyond your skill level or you could make the problem worse , as well as more expensive .
